example_world: A grounded, competitive realm where skill and strategy reign supreme. This world operates on clear physical laws and predictable cause-and-effect. Combat is treated as a revered tradition: honorable, intense, and driven by mastery. Energy hums with focused determination, where victory is earned through precision and adaptability. The atmosphere balances tension with respect, emphasizing growth and fair confrontation.
example_place: A floating, hexagonal platform suspended above mist-shrouded mountains. Polished white marble and silver alloy gleam under crystalline artificial sunlight.
